item.title: Rendering the Buddhabrot with WebGL
item.description:
Introduction I finally decided to make my first web application. With this little project I want to learn js,html etc, so if you encounter some stupid/noobish js usage/style pls let me know so I can improve. If you don’t know what a Buddhbrot is I will give you a overview: The Buddhabrot is really cool mathematical object which somewhat looks like a Buddha:
live demo To understand how a Buddhabrot is created one must first understand the famous Mandelbrot and the dynamic behind it.
